name: Bravo Sample: Stripe Payment
description:
Made for Bravo Studio.

Add one-time card payments integrated with Stripe in your Bravo app with this sample Figma file.

The file includes layers named with Bravo Tags, containers, and other essential setup. 🤓


To see the final result, go to Bravo Studio > Sample Apps section and duplicate this app. The duplicated app will include a connected API collection and data binding. Test it with Bravo Vision previewer app 🚀


Learn more about setting up payments in Bravo Studio.


Check out Bravo Studio 👏

www.bravostudio.app
